, please come to the Mysterium in Allemantheia.

There are things we must discuss.

- Ryshan
<PCNAME> helped out in the Mysterium's refugee Isolation Camp, then helped them create an Aura Sentinel in Bastion.

, you've came.

The Mysterium is currently researching the crystal powder that comes from Murderwings and Mournwings.

I think you already know most of it, but please let me tell you our theory."Please go on."

The creatures secrete an unknown substance from its wing. It's similar to a finely grinded crystal.

When monsters inhale this powder, the nervous system disturbed, causing the monsters to become furous.

What's worse is..."Please continue."

If a creature touches the powder, it's body slowly turns into crystal.
It's also possible to be infected by the crystal by physical contact.

You should take a look for yourself.

Take these. A normal insect and powder from a crystallized insect.
Please put them in the device next to me.
(The device hums to life as you place the insect on the left and the powder on the right.)
Crystal Powder Sensor
(The insect has been crystallized.)

This experiment proves what we already know: exposure to the powder, no matter where it comes from, has catastrophic effects on living creatures.

The greater the exposure, the faster the infection spreads.

The Mysterium still needs more time to figure out what is causing the crystallization, but we'll get there soon."How can I help?"

We've dispatched researchers to set up an Isolation Camp in Sienna Canyon.

Whatever you can do to help them would be appreciated.
Have you checked the sensor?

You've came all the way here to help us? Thank you so much!

Say, you didn't happen to see any other researchers on the way here, did you? My associate Teyer was supposed to bring some samples from the Isolation Camp, but I haven't heard anything from them for a couple hours.

Would you please go to the camp and see what's going on?"I will."

Thank you again.

It's not like Teyer to go silent like this. Please head south and look for his Supply Wagon.

Oh, hello there.

Did you see those hyenas! They're usually quite docile, but for some reason they just attacked my wagon.

I'm no adventurer, so I ran away. I watched them rummage around in the supplies, but they didn't take or damage anything."Are you hurt?"

I got a few scratches when I jumped from the wagon, but I'm okay.

I checked on the samples as soon as I came back, but our research data is scattered all over the place. Can you help me gather the data?

Thank you so much!

The wagon is a little damaged, but it will still roll.

I'll head on to Roostcliff Quarter; you should head over to the Isolation Camp and see if they need any help.

You're new here, aren't you? Most people avoid this camp like the...well, you know.

This camp is as safe as anyplace on Shara right now, though I am worried about rumors of a purple object seen in the skies above Balder's Refuge.

Of course I'm worried about the civilians, too, but at the same time we have to think about preserving the relics in this area."The relics will be fine."

A discussion for another time, perhaps.

Our current focus is contructing effective shelters for these refugees. We're doing our best, but we're short on supplies and healthy bodies to assemble them. Are you willing to help?"Of course, whatever you need."

The trees around here are too brittle for tent supports, but the bodies of Arbosk Enchanters are quite strong.

And as nature spirits, you're not really killing them during the harvesting process. Just sending them back to the Dream to be reborn elsewhere.

Thank you for this.

Your next step will be to fashion this wood into tent supports.

Here, use this tool box while I set up your next task.
Please use the tool box to craft tent supports.
Now that we have a support frame, we need some leather to cover it up. The recent population explosion of Ruins Hyenas solves that problem for us. You can hunt them down and use their leather.

Nicely done. Now we can finish this tent.

You hold up the frame while I cover it.
We need that leather. Please collect hides from Ruins Hyenas.

Your hard work has provided shelter for a new refugee family. You should be proud of your efforts today.

My next duty is to dispense medicine to these people. Will you assist me?"My pleasure."

The medicine is in those boxes. Each person should receive one topical patch each day.

Why don't you start at the tent over there.

?

What's that in your hand...?

No! I don't want any more medicine!

Get away! No!"Ameldas, please take it."

I said no!

Every day that weird thing! It makes me feel funny. I won't take it anymore!"Please, it's for your own good."

Well...

I'll do it if you give me a new toy!

What is that? Is it a toy?

It is. Oh, what a marvelous top!
"Ready for your medicine?"

Well...alright...

(Ameldas lets you apply the patch)

Can I have my toy now?

Ah, you helped the Mysterium researchers in the Isolation Camp. Thank you, .

There are no reports whatsoever on the illness caused by the amber powder. The researchers are working around the clock to find a way of returning a crystallized body back to its original form.

Numerous researchers are working simultaneously on finding a cure."I hope you manage to develop of a cure."

Looks like you've done a lot of work here today,
. We're happy to host you as long as you want to help, but there's a developing situation to the north.

Our expedition in the Veritas District is trying to create a Murderwing early warning system. They can use someone like you in Bastion, . "Bastion?"

Of course. You're so busy, you probably forgot about Bastion. Balder's Refuge is one of the most important archaeological sites in the world, the ancient home of the gods Balder and Seren.

The many relics there draw all sorts of unwanted attention, and our researchers in the town of Bastion are always organizing survey teams. We can't afford to have the amber powder spread to such a sacred place.

If you have the time, please go there and speak to my colleague Larive.

Hello, . What brings you here?
Oh, Ryshan sent you to help us assemble an Aura Sentinel? We're barely to the prototype stage, but even that will give us some warning should those creatures invade the refuge.

Are you familiar with Defense Stones? It's a similar design."A little bit."

Defense Stones react to a specific conditions, creating an impenetrable barrier when danger is near.

For instance, let's say a you want to keep a banana safe from a sloth. All you have to do is design a Defense Stone that would react to anything that would steal a banana. And voila!"Bananas. Right."

(Larive gives you a mistrustful look.)

I don't trust humans, .
I'd rather see for myself and make up my own mind. I was just in the process of creating a Defense Stone.
We can use that one.

You've got some amber powder there.
Take it to the magic stone at the entrance to the next building.

Like you just saw, the prototype sensed the powder and activated a barrier.

When fully powered, the Aura Sentinel will be able to detect the tiniest grains of amber powder, and protect the entire refuge."Impressive."

We still need more information on the amber powder, and how it operates. There was supposed to be a messenger heading our way with research data, but none have approached me so far.

Do you know anything about it besides that it comes from Murderwings?"Well, actually..."

Good. But we should definitely be able to calibrate the Aura Sentinel for that. When it's done, we'll do a larger scale test.

But at present, we don't have enough materials for more than one installation. "Gathering materials? My specialty!"

"Thank you." First talk to Arelle at the well nearby.
She has the talent of a Circle Magician and is an expert in Defense Stones.
Have you examined the Defense Stone?

Are you ? Don't look so shocked.
Almost everyone in the Mysterium knows who you are.

You can call me Arelle, but you probably already know that. "I'm here to help."

Excellent. We're very grateful for your help at times like these.

You can position the Defense Stone close to me.
We'll go into full production of the keystones Larive needs as soon as possible.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"I hope I was helpful."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

I heard the Isolation Camp in Sienna Canyon is short on people.

As soon as my work here is done, I may join them in searching for a cure.
